name: Crime and Punishment (itch)
description:
Run away from a giant snowball while avoiding the obstacles in your path! WASD/Arrow keys control, and this game is also available for touchscreen/Mobile! Click the screen if the controls don't work initially.

This game was also made for an English Project, that is why you see quotes from Crime and Punishment in the Startup Screen. The whole game is basically a Crime and Punishment metaphor.

Enjoy!
